laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevation in leukocyte count, neutrophil count, erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), C-reactive protein (CRP), and serum amyloid protein (SAA) levels. Specific numerical values for these tests were not provided.

Identified a heterozygous variation of NLRP3 gene (c.784-786delinsTGG) resulting in amino acid substitution of arginine for tryptophan at codon 262 (p.R262W). Predicted to be probably damaging with a PolyPhen-2 score of 1.000 and disease-causing with a MutationTaster score of 0.999.
